item.title: Chemical Programming in Earl-Grey
item.description: While driving home from Madison, I decided to listen to The Changelog and my favorite topic is always languages so I opted for their episode with Carin Meier on Clojure and her new book, Living Clojure. In the podcast, Carin discusses her love of reading PLT and especially unconventional paradigms. Though my ability to read PLT is limited (I have little-to-no background in Calculus), I do really love finding innovative ways to program.
